title: Lets actually discuss Fiora, reds welcome.
body:
Let me start with this, right now, Fiora is in a bad state. Before, Fiora was in a bad state. The buffs Riot is planning, may or may not help. This is not a mindless buff Fiora thread, this is a "Riot here's what we think" thread. Allow me to begin with what I think. Skip to the end if you don't care, but you'll miss some neat-o jokes ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

-First off, Fiora's ultimate, it's off thematically. It's also off in the sense of game-play wise. Before, Fiora was a split-push champion, such as Tryndamere, high damage, no real cc. High risk, high reward. Riot completely changed this. 
They then gave her an ultimate that requires you to do a near impossible feat, only to summon a heal janna-style. I played Fiora recently, and although I got the early advantage, the second I hit 6, the enemy had a real tool while I had... I don't know what I had. If I killed my lane opponent, I got a heal...why? This did not help me in any way. Will her ult be useless until team fights begin? You gave her this big a restriction Riot.

Now let me tell you, in my opinion how to fix this. We can keep the ult as it is, but change some numbers around and add some stuff in. For example, instead of dealing 20% of an enemy max hp upon hitting all 4 vital spots, make hitting each Vital spot do 5% max hp as bonus damage. Give her a passive on her ultimate so she does not fall behind such as "Lust for challenge :- Fiora gains bonus attack damage and life steal the longer she remains in battle up to a maximum of 3-7/5.5-9.5/8-12% life steal and 5-5-20/6-24/7-28 over 4 seconds."

This way, Fiora will at least gain something from her ultimate for lane??

Lunge :- Next off, her Q. For the love of god her Q. Oh Jesus her Q. Someone fix her damn Q. The enemies vital was facing right towards me as I lunged him and it still did not proc it. I am so mad. Just make it so her Q can proc the vital no matter where it is as long as Fiora hit the enemy with Q.

Riposte :- The W. How did I remember it's name? That's not the point. So Fiora's W can block Fizz shark from eating her, (The actual shark popping up, not when you toss them Nemo.)  but it can't block Brand's W? Now i'm confused. I have no preference here as to which it should or shouldn't block, but I feel you guys are being kinda...fishy with this. (Heh, see what I did there? Okay i'm sorry, please don't go.) but um yeah, I just wanted to tell you guys that.

Idk I found her new E kinda entertaining, buff the ratio's idk I like it. Let it do something special for turrents to help her split push idk.

tl;dr :- Let's share our opinions on Fiora, mine is that her R is restrictive, Q needs more vital targeting, W is broken?, E is cool but might need buffs?

tl;dr;tl;dr :- I give u opinion, u give me opinion.

replies.body: Haven't played her.  Don't plan on playing her.  I detest that style of champ.  That said, her ult looks really restrictive to me.  I don't know how anyone is going to reliably land all four shots on anyone.  And the heal is weird as well.  Why is the badass duelist healing herself and her allies because she landed four precise blows?  It makes no thematic sense.
The weakspot's make sense thematically but the healing aspect is to encourage teamwork and make the struggle for a successful fiora ult "worth".
Also to let her do crazy sh*t like 1v3 and tower dive for a kill before getting out and potentially wrecking even more face thanks to the heal.

Not even Faker can hit 4 weak points while being tower dived by 3. You gotta remember, CC, and enemies move. They wont let you hit them that easily. MAYBE if when her ultimate was used, Fiora's Q gained a whole lot more range. Now that would make it possible and cool. (Just as a side-note, I mean Fiora's Q's range increases within the boundaries of her ultimate.)
My opinion? It's only been a few days, it's basically a new champion. People are still building her full AD when she benefits from a slightly different build path now.

> [{quoted}](name=moberrybusiness,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BMEwYtV7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-10T05:00:22.529+0000)
>
> My opinion? It's only been a few days, it's basically a new champion. People are still building her full AD when she benefits from a slightly different build path now.

Just wanted to make a quick reply. Honeslty after 30+ games with her. Tried her in many different ways. AD is the best way she benefits. Maybe a few bruiser items like Hydra Clever TriForce. but all in all, she is still a AD reliant champion
Try Randuin's Omen. Due to the lack of invulnerability she now requires a bit more tankage and Randuin's supplies some much needed utility to better line up your Vitals.
Having to build randuins on a champ who is supposed to be an assassin/duelist just to make them work, says a lot about this rework.

> [{quoted}](name=TheFirstGokun,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BMEwYtV7,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-10T10:15:49.928+0000)
>
> Try Randuin's Omen. Due to the lack of invulnerability she now requires a bit more tankage and Randuin's supplies some much needed utility to better line up your Vitals.

The irony I find about this is, she is supposed to be this amazing tank shredder. yet in a few upcoming patches, tanks are getting kinda nerfed, So we see a lot more assassins that can possible scale way better than her XD

I think if her Ult was more like Xin Zhao's in the aspect of getting bonus resistances and such vs the person he's dueling, it would be more useful. Perhaps not the same as Xin's but the same concept would be cool. Cuz i agree the ult seems rather clunky to me. It seems if best used Kill Stealing midway through a fight. lol
Yea, like bonus damage against the targeted enemy?

That could work.. Right now its just, odd. So just about anything that helps here 1v1 would be better.. Not something that says oh thank god i used 3 spells and killed sm1 who probably could use 4... now i get a giant heal as a sigh of relief.. lol wtf. Give her "dodge chance" or some shit bahaha fuck this heal tho. I'm all for fiora taking skill but this is just unrewarding to me.

Yes they've removed her split push aspects and turned her into a team champion, but kept her as a squishy damage champion. Her ult would work well with a tank who's chalk-full of CC, but it makes no sense for a damage dealer/split pusher. Maybe instead of a heal, it could create an arena trapping enemies and giving allies rage? Just pouring out ideas here.
Kind of makes me wonder if she has to build like a bruiser now.

After spamming a bunch of Fiora last night and today, im pretty sure most people dont have a clue how to actually play her. But discussions are nice

The ult. So many different thoughts on this one. The prevailing one being it isnt thematic (which i personally disagree with) and that it is just awful to use (which I agree with to an extent). But so many people dont understand how it works. First, it isnt 20% max enemy hp upon hitting all 4 vitals. It works exactly as her passive, and it works exactly as you listed. Each Vital deals 5% max hp, for a total of 20% if you hit all 4.

People arent treating her ult properly. It is (kind of) like a Tryndamere ult. The heal after kill allows you to do things that would normally be suicidal in order to get the kill. It lets you take risks to secure the kill and get that last hit off of the ult. And when you do it, good god does it feel good.

I felt this way for the first couple of games as well. Then I went into a custom game with a friend for 10 minutes to test it. How it works is that when she dashes, she does a Yasuo Q style attack at the end of the dash. So the only way to get it to properly hit a vital is to not dash into them, you need to either dash slightly in front of them, or dash slightly to the side. If her Q proced a vital no matter where she hit them, that would make her laning even more ungodly oppressive than it is.

Fiora's W is weird. it has so much incredible power, but the clarity of the skill is basically non existant. Like trying to drive in fog as thick as clam chowder. The only time it felt good was with telegraphed abilities like Jaxs E.

Her E is overall fine, AA reset and slow. I just kind of wish she got a boost to attack speed for the 2 hits, since her current kit doesnt promote her building any real amount of attack speed anyways.

For R- I mean an insta 5% max hp per hit. Not all 20% after hitting the 4 vitals. And while Tryndamere makes him invulnerable WHILE he fights, Fiora is AFTER she fights. Which makes no sense.
Well maybe as long as the vital is facing in the direction of Fiora it should at least proc it. I mean come on that should be common sense.
I agree with the rest though.
That is HOW her ult works right now. It isnt 20% after 4 hits. It is 5% max hp per hit.

Ah I see. I didn't notice, I thought that was just the passive working itself and that after 4 hits I would get another 20%. (I was never able to get all 4 hits so I didn't know.) They should update the tooltip if that is the case.

I agree, the tooltip is slightly misleading, but only takes 6 minutes of testing in a custom game to see.

If it worked the way you thought it would truly be the worst ultimate in the game.
Haha, yeah. Thanks for the information.
Fight me with your words reds.

Her Q sucks, it just does ranged damage with a new special targeting system... Her R does no initial damage and because its based off her passive its impossible to hit a moving target 4x (especially on different sides and behind them). Also her passive is impossible to land in lane because of her Q not being able to bring her self to her target. 
Oh and since her E is still an auto reset the attack speed for 2 attacks doesn't make a single difference at all... like not one bit, it makes no sense what so ever.


Fix her Q by allowing her to actually go to her target (like it did before) and scrap her Passive / ult, and make her E last x seconds and tune it per attack used with it activated.

Im hearing a lot of more time for the attack speed buff and I kind of agree, how else will she successfully push? Whats the use taking her versus someone else? Before if you were planning on split pushing the whole time, she killed towers with a nice attack speed buff along with W passive.. now not really.

honeslty since she is a duelist, I expected a self reliant ult, something that made her stronger as a reward, something kinda like nasus stacks or even a power buff during its duration. I can see how encouraging teamwork might help, but in reality, Her team cannot help her use her ult. Think about it in the middle of a fight, people wont piortize your target. It is completely reliant on whatever the fight dictates.

My quick opinions ( as my other posts )

P - Absoultey fun idea, not very reliable . Maybe make the mark appear faster 4secs per change or something?
Here is my full post about it ( [(http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/K5koA94p-fioras-passive-suggestion)]

Q - Great mechanic, needs shorter cool down and maybe a better scaling?

W - Honeslty I think this is the only broken part about her, Too op in some scenarios, yet the major drawback is that she becomes immobile?? kind of a catch 22 don't cha think?

R - Diffently something weird here, a lot of people agree with this. Major concern is that hitting all 4 vitals doesn't seem very rewarding. Perhaps the reward should be focused to herself ? ( like a perma attack boost ? ) or ( Increased stats during the duration with CDR reduction, like Master YI )
